PM.text: Climate change is bad because it leads to air pollution.
Air pollution kills many people because it leads to them developing lung cancer.
Air pollution also causes poverty by decreasing tourism, which hurts the economy.
Climate change also leads to heatwaves as the ozone effect takes place.
Climate change is bad because it leads to air pollution.
Air pollution kills many people by causing them to develop lung cancer.
Air pollution also causes poverty -- decreasing tourism, which hurts the economy.
Climate change also leads to heatwaves due to the ozone effect.
